item.title: R and Its Application for Nanomanufacturing
item.description:
This site is to share learning of R and its application to nanomanufacturing.

The planned format would includes:

  • Problem statement
  • Work flow
  • Solution with R
    • Existing tools
    • New development
  • Round up
